DeathSteel::

He walked a few yards from the pod, turned and shot the pod.  It 
exploded into a huge fireball that rose through the trees like a 
small nuclear blast.  He smiled, "I wonder if that would attract 
attention." he said with a slight evil grin.  He transformed into 
his dragon mode and started to fly East.  He had a wing span of  150 
feet.  His dragon body was 100 feet long with tail included.  He 
glided on the warm air currents as he scanned the area.   He landed 
near a volcano creator.  It was dormant.  No lava flowed.  No smoke 
arose.  He liked the area.  Jagged rocks surrounding the mountain 
sides that lead up to the top of the volcano.  Perfect for cover 
from a ground attack.  And plenty of refuge from an airial a OK, If 
assault.  He smiled. "Now all I need is a base, hmmm, yessss."  He 
transformed into bot mode and started a scan for all forms of life.  

OOC:
If anyone wants a char to be found, let me know.  The location of 
the volcano is basically in North America, where Mt.St. Helens is.  
So if anyone is near there, let me know.  
Logo
